extendedInfo.description: DESCRIPTIONMobile Banking, the remote control for your money. Manage your bank accounts, make transfers, pay bills, find branches, ATMs and more right from your Androidâ¢. To get started, please enroll in First Niagara Online Banking. (FirstNiagara.com/Enroll)If you are already enrolled, download the app to:MONITOR YOUR ACCOUNTâ¢	View account balancesâ¢	Access transaction historyMAKE TRANSFERS & PAY BILLSâ¢	Transfer money between First Niagara accountsâ¢	Pay bills*â¢	Make changes to pending transactionsFIND LOCATIONSâ¢	Find the closest ATM and First Niagara branch*Payees must be established within the Bill Pay feature of First Niagara Online Banking.Androidâ¢  is a registered trademark of Google, Inc.Privacy Notice for Consumers <-- https://www.firstniagara.com/Ancillary___Footer_Pages/Privacy_Policy/Privacy_Policy.aspx-->First Niagara Bank, N.A. Member FDIC.Â©2012 First Niagara Bank, N.A. All rights reserved.First Niagara website <--https://www.firstniagara.com-->

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good for what i need it for - checking balances and making transfers. But they need to visually indicate the credits vs debits. Use font color, patenthesis for the debits, negative numbers... just having the words \"credit\" and \"debit\" to the left makes it too hard to visually scan the list quickly.
reviews.author: J Clark

reviews.title: No cents
reviews.comment: I dont know if its a galaxy s4 issue or app issue. Just upgraded from droid x. I can only enter whole dollar amounts to pay bills. Used to be able to enter cents. Someone please fix.
reviews.author: Jeff Juhn

reviews.title: Convenient
reviews.comment: My needs are pretty basic.  I like to see what my balance is while out and about.  The ability to do transfers when necessary is very convenient.
reviews.author: Victor Reboy

reviews.title: Very convenient for my needs
reviews.comment: It works well for my needs; checking balances, being able to transfer funds. I do not pay bills via my accounts, so I have no need for that on the mobile app.
reviews.author: Deb Chapman

reviews.title: User friendly
reviews.comment: I just upgraded to a HTC One X recently,  This was a very easy application for me to use.  The app does what I need it to do and that is having the ability to check my balances easily, transfer between accounts.  I do online bill pay other ways and not directly through the bank. I\'ve had no issues with it, and have been using the app for several months.
reviews.author: Darlene LaBonte

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work half the time. Says loading and won\'t load even if I leave it up 10 minutes. Other times it works perfect. Will be closing my account Monday and going elsewhere. FN also never payed me my new account bonus I was promised. Guess it\'s a scam to get people to join. More reason to leave.
reviews.author: Eric Devine

reviews.title: Convenient
reviews.comment: Simple, useful, easy. Cant really complain.
reviews.author: Brittany Taylor

reviews.title: Incredibly Convenient
reviews.comment: This app is great for checking my balance and transferring funds between accounts.  I would like more features, like the ability to deposit checks, but those will come later, I guess.
reviews.author: Dan Chieffallo

reviews.title: Optional auto logout
reviews.comment: Quite honestly the app is decent but there should be options for notifying upon deposits clearing or even optonal forced logout sessions good app but just like the bank it came from slow on function and hsbc should\'ve kept in wny
reviews.author: dave martin

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: I have a Samsung Galaxy Rush. Love the app, would have given it 5 stars if were able to take picture of checks to be deposited instead of going to bank...
reviews.author: Randy Robinson

reviews.title: Neil U.
reviews.comment: App seems to work well on the Samsung Galaxy S3.  So far no serious issues. I think most problems are due to low signal on the phones. This being said, I will rate the App a solid 4.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It works... Kinda.
reviews.comment: The first time I signed in, I could do the transfer. After that first time, it didn\'t work anymore. I had to clear the app data and then re-sign in to use it. Kinda funky, but it does make transfers easier. The mobile browser doesn\'t render the page very well.
reviews.author: Sean Killian

reviews.title: Bad app
reviews.comment: This app is outdated. This is the only bank I have that won\'t let you deposit via the app.
reviews.author: Ahron Darnell

reviews.title: Very Nice!
reviews.comment: I use it on my Nexus 7 and HTC Evo 4G phone. No problems at all.
reviews.author: Michael Young

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Great but no decimal point on the transfer or bill pay amount screens.
reviews.author: D Watton

reviews.title: Works as advertised
reviews.comment: I don\'t use it for much more than checking my balance, but I haven\'t had it lie to me about locations like others seem to have had. Works well and when you log in, if you\'re not using the system keyboard, it lets you know that you could be running a security risk. Didn\'t stop me, but nice to know they care to tell you.
reviews.author: Ben Furco

reviews.title: Its good!!
reviews.comment: It was good at first but than its just problems errors  and more errors so I don\'t recommends it.
reviews.author: Zorymar Santiago

reviews.title: a good app for people on the go!!!
reviews.comment: i\'m on the go a lot the app help me in so many ways. without it I would be on the phone a lot. good job First Niagara. and thank you for keeping up with the 21st century! as some banks have not done so.
reviews.author: Billy Columbel

reviews.title: Well...it works
reviews.comment: For my basic needs of checking balances and basic bill pay, it works. When checking debits vs. deposits, there is no visual cue, which makes scanning transactions more involved.  In several occasions, I get an error message stating that there are \"no transactions to display\" which is both annoying and inaccurate because I know there should have been. Overall, I won\'t uninstall the app and if you are looking for a quick way to check balances, this will do the trick
reviews.author: Bianca J

reviews.title: unreliable app
reviews.comment: twice so far I had to uninstall this app. It does not recognize my password. I talked to a bank person and she told me that sometimes the app \"acts up\". Also, you cannot use it to deposit checks so it is not as versatile as other banks\' apps.
reviews.author: Dan Zacharia
